Jo Harrop and Jamie McCredie: Weathering the Storm review they get everything right ...  guitar accompaniment is light, almost skeletal at times, but always cannily fitting. There's always space around the music, and this holds the listener's attention well, mine anyway. All 11 songs are slow, or slowish, ballads and the calm mood settles them happily together. It's an enterprising choice too: the rarely heard Early Autumn, Randy Newman's Guilty, Legrand's You Must Believe In Spring , etc. People remember albums like this, with their own unique atmosphere that you enter as you listen. Just what we need at this trying time. 'Snowpiercer' Becomes A Post-Apocalyptic Train Murder Mystery On Netflix ...  day after its release on May 25. Episodes are being released weekly, so binging the 10-episode series is not yet an option. Snowpiercer is an adaptation of Bong Joon Ho's 2013 feature film, starring Chris Evans and Tilda Swinton. Bong Joon Ho based his film on the French graphic novel Le Transperceneige by Jacques Lob, Benjamin Legrand and Jean-Marc Rochette, published in 1982. After Lob's death in 1990, Legrand continued the story in two more volumes, L'Arpenteur and La Traverse , published in 1999 and 2000. A fourth volume was published in 2015 (after the release of the film), Olivier Bocquet continuing the series with Terminus . Matz wrote the fifth volume, a prequel to the series, published a year ago in 2019, Extinctions vol.1 . Bong Joon ...

Coronavirus won't stop Eric LeGrand's annual Walk to Believe -- and here's how you can help ...  the night, with fireworks, a live band and a deejay to entertain the participants around Rutgers ' SHI Stadium, and the biggest fundraising goal for spinal cord research yet. Then came the coronavirus . "I'm not going to lie, when we had to cancel the walk, it hurt, because I knew this was my 10-year anniversary and it was going to be something special," LeGrand said. "It was going to be an event celebrating 10 years of fighting paralysis -- not 10 years of feeling down about what happened, but 10 years of fighting. "It took me a week to get out of that funk."
